name: Sumo Seals
description:
Sumo Seals is the perfect game for players who like to be dropped right into the heart of the action and revel in the chaos of the unpredictable. Solo or with friends, the game includes various modes and maps to cater to players of all skill level and preferred gameplay styles. From sports modes where teamplay is crucial to protecting seal pups against waves of grime for cooperative play, there is something for everyone. No need to grind endlessly for unlockables, Sumo Seals lays everything on the table the first time you boot up the game.

Solo & Local Multiplayer/Coop


Solo or with friends, Sumo Seals comes with a selection of modes and maps for all skill ranges and levels of intensity.

Ludicrous Powerups


Tip the balance with bonkers powerups and catch your friends off guard.

Bounce in Style


Customize your seally buddies with ridiculous headgear and accessories.

For Bulletpoints Lovers
  • Various modes featuring different playstyles (e.g. Sports, Challenges, Survival)
  • Most modes support up to 4 players & bots can be selected if playing solo.
  • Dozens of quirky maps each with their own set of obstacles
  • Quirky and often chaotic set of items to help you turn the tides of battle
  • Customizable headgear and accessories
  • Full Controller Support. Playstation, Xbox or Switch controller support included as well
  • Leaderboard support for competitive modes

Please note that while you can play with a keyboard, it is very HIGHLY RECOMMENDED that you use controllers for local multiplayer.

[Early Access Notes]
  • Bots are still extremely rudimentary and meant as quick fillers. For the best gaming experience, human players are recommended.
  • Localization is at a basic stage. Basic Google Translate has been used for the majority of it but localization will be completed before full release.
  • Mac & Linux versions are available but have not been fully tested.
